item.title: Writing Safer and Faster C++
item.description: C++ is notoriously difficult. There are software problems related to memory leaks, undefined behavior and concurrency issues that are easy to miss in C++ code. Noticing these problems and debugging them later on is hard. But there are instruments that make writing C++ code faster, easier and safer! In this post I will cover some that you can use in your projects to find existing bugs and prevent new ones, track performance regressions and find bottlenecks, enforce style guides and ensure stability.
